mapper.select: SELECT ment.detail_content as content, conre.id as comId, IFNULL(con.type, 0) AS type, mm.nickname AS nickname, mm.id as userId, msg.id as msgId, (case when mm.user_type = 2 then 0 else mm.user_type end )as userType, att.address AS address , DATE_FORMAT(msg.created_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS date , con.title as message, con.id as messageId , IFNULL(msg.read_type,0) as readType , con.type as conType , mm.id as pId , con.id as conId from alq_consultation as con left join alq_consultation as conre on conre.consulatation_id=con.id LEFT JOIN alq_member as mm on mm.id =conre.member_id LEFT JOIN alq_member_msg AS msg on msg.member_base_id =mm.id , alq_attachment as att , alq_consultation_attachment as ment WHERE att.id = mm.logo_attachment_id and ment.consultation_id = conre.id and ment.address is null and msg.member_id=#{mLId} and msg.member_base_id=#{memId} and msg.consulatation_id=#{conId} and msg.created_time = conre.created_time
select * from alq_consultation_attachment where consultation_id =#{id} and detail_content is not null

SELECT IFNULL(consulatation_id,0) AS conId, type AS type, IFNULL(consulatation_comment_id,0) AS comId, member_base_id AS memId , member_id as mLId FROM alq_member_msg WHERE member_id = #{mId}
AND type= 4 ORDER BY created_time DESC LIMIT #{page},#{rows}

SELECT mm.id as pId, COMMEN .title as content, COMMEN.id as comId, IFNULL(COMMEN .type, 0) AS info, mm.nickname AS nickname, mm.id as userId, msg.id as msgId, IFNULL(msg.read_type,0) as readType, (case when mm.user_type = 2 then 0 else mm.user_type end )as userType, att.address AS address, DATE_FORMAT(msg.created_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS date , COMMEN.type as conType , COMMEN.id as conId FROM alq_consultation COMMEN LEFT JOIN alq_member_msg AS msg on COMMEN.id=msg.consulatation_id LEFT JOIN alq_member AS mm ON mm.id =msg.member_base_id LEFT JOIN alq_attachment AS att ON att.id = mm.logo_attachment_id WHERE COMMEN.id = #{conId} AND msg.type =5 AND msg.member_base_id = mm.id AND mm.id = #{memId} AND msg.member_id = #{mLId}

SELECT COMMEN .content, IFNULL(COMMEN .comment_info_id, 0) AS info, mm.nickname AS nickname, mm.id as userId, msg.id as msgId, COMMEN.id as comId, (case when mm.user_type = 2 then 0 else mm.user_type end )as userType, att.address AS address, IFNULL(msg.read_type,0) as readType , DATE_FORMAT(msg.created_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS date , conn.id as conId, conn.type as conType FROM alq_consultation_comment COMMEN LEFT JOIN alq_consultation as conn on COMMEN.consultation_id = conn.id, alq_member AS mm LEFT JOIN alq_attachment AS att ON att.id = mm.logo_attachment_id, alq_member_msg AS msg WHERE msg.consulatation_comment_id = COMMEN .id AND COMMEN.id = #{comId} AND msg.type=5 AND msg.member_base_id = mm.id AND mm.id = #{memId} AND msg.member_id = #{mLId}
